question: Which of the following scheme is not under the National mission of sustainable agriculture?
explanation:
The Schemes under NMSA are:
1. Rainfed Area Development (RAD)
2. Soil Health Management (SHM)
3. Sub Mission on Agro-Forestry (SMAF)
4. Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana (PKVY)
5. Soil and Land Use Survey of India (SLUSI)
6. National Rainfed Area Authority (NRAA)
7. Mission Organic Value Chain Development in North Eastern Region (MOVCDNER)
8. National Centre of Organic Farming (NCOF)
9. Central Fertilizer Quality Control and Training Institute (CFQC&TI)
